name: Find Yourself (TrofikGames)
description:
• Hello my dear friend! In this game you will completely plunge into the world of the Middle Ages and go on a fascinating adventure in which you will play for Knight Richard. Unfortunately, he lost his memory and remembers almost nothing, but you can help him! Complete various missions and solve this mystery. Good luck !!!
  • Story:
    You woke up in the thicket of the forest ...
    Round nobody, and you do not remember anything ...
    But suddenly you saw a pointer to the village
    - Yeah, it's salvation!
    You are asking all residents who can be asked for help in such a difficult situation.
    You are sent to a nearby village to the local Mage, from whom you will learn that there is a potion to restore memory
    You have to go on an exciting journey through the kingdom
    There will be many obstacles that you will have to overcome, but remember they are not so easy ...
    Come with me on this journey
  • Game Features:
    Isometric
    Inventory system included
    Included trading system with residents
    The system of aggression of residents is included
    Fascinating battle system
    And much more...
